Title: Scheme C6
Writer: Cory DuVal, MC Mars, Rob Nilsson
Actors: Cory DuVal, Monica Cortes Viharo, David Fine, MC Mars
Plot: Bid, a biker maverick, lives on wits and adrenalin, selling stolen auto parts, sleeping in alleys chained to his bike. He taunts his cop father who tries to protect him from his inevitable downfall.
